about_the_game:
In this game, you'll play as a private investigator, discovering the horrors that lie underneath. Three S Class patients have gone missing from the [Redacted] psychiatric facility. All evidence leads back to a house that seems abandoned, with no one there for years. For a long time, you stake out the house, seeing nothing move at all until one day, you go in at the dead of night, the horrors that lie within – or should I say below – this house will horrify you. (Probably)

This game is a first person horror game why you discover what's going on with missing persons and a corrupt scientist find items littered around to access locked doors and secret passages

On a real note, it's your average game with nothing new or innovative. I just wanted to create a game actually on Steam finish a project instead of starting new ones. So, if you'd like an below average indie horror title, here it is.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
